title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Updated GitHub Actions: Bumped `actions/upload-artifact` from v4.3.3 to v6.0.0 and `actions/download-artifact` from v4.1.7 to v7.0.0 in code scanning workflows.
Enhanced GHES 3.19.0 release notes: Added note about YJIT (Ruby's JIT compiler) being enabled by default for improved performance.
Modified Copilot model statuses: Changed GPT-5.2 (OpenAI) and Claude Opus 4.5 (Anthropic) from "Public preview" to "GA" (General Availability).

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Updated GitHub Actions: Bumped `actions/upload-artifact` from v4.3.3 to v6.0.0 and `actions/download-artifact` from v4.1.7 to v7.0.0 in code scanning workflows.
- Enhanced GHES 3.19.0 release notes: Added note about YJIT (Ruby's JIT compiler) being enabled by default for improved performance.
- Modified Copilot model statuses: Changed GPT-5.2 (OpenAI) and Claude Opus 4.5 (Anthropic) from "Public preview" to "GA" (General Availability).

### Title  
Update GHES release notes, bump GitHub Actions versions, and promote Copilot models to GA
